EmailTemplate.description: Email communication sent to the original triage responsible and all previous approvers to inform that the case has been reviewed by the Deputy Commissioner and he/she agreed to escalate and assign this case to an investigator
EmailTemplate.name: 20 - Case Escalated - Approved info to initial requestor
EmailTemplate.subject: A case for {!Case.Provider_Name_For_Email_Merge__c} has been escalated
